A7_DCP_INVERTER_OFF.description: Send the square wave signal from the MSP430 to the amp

A7_DISABLE_DCP_INVERTER.description: Take the square wave signal away from the amp

A7_ENABLE_DCP_INVERTER.description: Send the square wave signal from the MSP430 to the amp

A7_INIT.description: Initialize the MSP430 on the A7

steps.description: SPI on bits 4 & 5, PWM on bit 6; all else GPIO
Bit 0 is input; bit 4 is SOMI; rest are outputs
Setup Class D Disable as output
Set remainder of port 2 as output except Bit 4
Set all of port 3 to be outputs
Set all of port 5 to be outputs
Set all of port 6 to be outputs
Set all of port 7 to be outputs
Set all of port 8 to be outputs
Configure PWM2 to power the inverter used in the DC power function
Put port pins and relays in dormant state.
Harmless delay with no comma at the end

A7_INIT_REMOVED.description: Holder for disabling parts of A7_INIT; chasing an elusive power up issue
